attributes.action: Reinstate Dubs amendment to the immigration bill for min. 3000 at risk children
attributes.additional_details: See Archbishop of Canterbury interview on world at one. Also, I have spoken to a Christian minister who has witnessed first hand how the traffickers work and what they do to these children. It is horrific. We have to step up, step in and help.
attributes.background: MPs recently voted to stop automatically allowing unaccompanied refugee children, currently in Europe, into the UK. These children are in a real and present danger from traffickers (refer to Archbishop of Canterbury). This decision needs to be reversed. It is immoral.
